# TravelG3n Web

A Next.js frontend for TravelG3n.

## Development

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

## Testing

```bash
npm run test -- --coverage
```

## E2E Testing

```bash
npm run test:e2e
```

## Features
- Itineraries page
- Sample data seeding
- UI components: Button, Navbar, ThemeToggle

## Code Quality
- Lint: `npm run lint`
- Build: `npm run build`
- Coverage: `npm run test -- --coverage`
